meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.1 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.1 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.8 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.8 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.0 has just been released. It comes with a set of new exciting features!

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.CR2 released!
meta.summary: The second candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.0.CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first candidate release of the upcoming Vert.x 4.1 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.

meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.1
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.1, including Vert.x HTTP proxy, RxJava 3, Open Telemetry, and more.
